name: Maze (itch) (Constructalor)
description:
You wake up from a deep sleep in an unfamiliar room. You have no idea how you got here. You see a dark hallway and a flashlight. You pick up the flashlight and try to find the exit. The maze is dark and confusing. Suddenly you hear footsteps. They're getting louder. You start running but the footsteps are faster. They're getting closer and closer...

its coming...

Maze is a fun horror game where you are placed in the center of a maze and have to escape. The maze is very dark so you will need a flashlight. But you are not alone in this maze. As you progress through the maze you will encounter numerous characters that will try and slow you down or give you quests in exchange for a reward. There are multiple creatures that may hunt you down and kill you so beware.
